greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: GCD of totients of consecutive integers.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = gcd(Phi(n+1), Phi(n)), where Phi = A000010.
mathematica: Map[GCD @@ # &, Partition[EulerPhi@ Range@ 98, 2, 1]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 22 2017 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Dec 21 2000
ext: Offset corrected to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Dec 10 2013
